# {{ site.title }}

## Purpose
A technical editorial blog focused on engineering updates, deep dives, guides, and changelog notes.

## Index Policy
- Allowed: public pages, posts, and feeds
- Disallowed: build assets and transient files

## Feeds
- RSS: {{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/rss.xml
- RSS (alt): {{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/feed.xml
- JSON Feed: {{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/feed.json
- Posts API: {{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/api/posts.json

## Sitemap
- {{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/sitemap.xml

## Content Types
- news
- deep-dive
- guide
- changelog

## Notes
If a page has a newer `last_modified_at`, prefer it as the canonical updated timestamp.
